wikitext.*:
{{expansion}}
'''Jay Johnstone''' is an artist who specializes in illustrations for [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s [[legendarium]]. His style is inspired from religious and medieval [[Wikipedia:icon|iconography]].

==Published artwork==
* [[2017]]: ''[[Aragorn: J. R. R. Tolkien's Undervalued Hero]]'' (Cover)
* [[2017]]: ''[[The Return of the Ring]]'' Volume 1 & 2 (Cover)
* [[2017]]: ''Tolkienography: Manuscripts of Middle Earth''
* [[2019]]: ''Tolkienography: Isildur's Bane''
* [[2019]]: ''[[Sub-creating Arda]]'' (Cover)
* [[2019]]: ''[[Tolkien's Library: An Annotated Checklist]]'' (Cover)
* [[2019]]: ''[[On Eagle's Wings – An Exploration of Eucatastrophe in Tolkien's Fantasy]]'' (Cover)
* [[2019]]: ''The Sub-Genres of British Fantasy Literature'' (Cover)
* [[2020]]: ''[[Death and Immortality in Middle-earth]]'' (Cover)
* [[2021]]: ''[[Tolkien and the Classical World]]'' (Cover)
* [[2021]]: ''[[Friendship in The Lord of the Rings]]'' (Art)
* [[2023]]: ''[[Tolkien's Library: An Annotated Checklist]]'' Second edition (Cover)
* [[2024]]: ''[[The Romantic Spirit in the Works of J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' (Cover)
